description: Complete system overview documenting the privacy compliance management system architecture, key components, and their interactions. Includes high-level documentation of all major subsystems and their relationships.

Detailed documentation of all risk-weighted compliance scoring algorithms, including maturity level calculations, urgency scoring formulas, and multi-framework gap analysis implementations. Covers mathematical models and decision logic for risk assessment.

Comprehensive documentation of data models for GDPR processing activities, data flow mapping, cross-border transfers, and legal basis tracking. Includes entity relationships and data structure specifications for all privacy-related data.

Technical documentation of the assessment workflow engine, including DPIA generation logic, privacy assessment frameworks, and compliance gap analysis processes. Details the business rules and control mapping algorithms.

Detailed documentation of how multiple privacy frameworks (GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, PIPEDA) are mapped and correlated, including control mapping logic, cross-framework compatibility, and automated recommendation generation algorithms.
